T02TD2985E:52b-0: @52b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2985E:52b-1: sha za'i gdon las thar bar 'dod pas /
T02TD2985E:52b-2: sngon du mtshan ma brtags te /
T02TD2985E:52b-3: sha skam zhing nga rgyal che /
T02TD2985E:52b-6: nor 'phrog pa dang lus shed chung ba'i mi la /
T02TD2985E:53a-1: dang gsum dang brgyad dang bcu gcig la 'jug ste /
T02TD2985E:53a-2: zhugs pa'i rtags ni sha mdog sngo bas rtsur pa dang /
T02TD2985E:53a-4: gzhan mthong na drag tu dgod cing gshe bar byed /
T02TD2985E:53a-5: phyi sa la khrag gi rlo can nam /
T02TD2985E:53a-6: sha za'i gdon mtshan ma gnyis pa ni lus 'dar /
T02TD2985E:53a-9: sha dang chang la dga' ba ni sprul pa'i 'dre zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2985E:53a-10: gsum pa nam mkha' la lta bar byed cing kha zas 'dor bar byed /
T02TD2985E:53a-11: chang dang sha la ngoms pa med pa ni sha za gzu lums can gyis zin pa'o //
T02TD2985E:53a-12: de dag las thar pa'i thabs ni /
T02TD2985E:53a-17: zho btsos dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ba lim nub phyogs su byin la /
T02TD2985E:53a-23: shr'i khanda'i me tog de dag cha bsnyams la /
T02TD2985E:53a-24: ra gcin du btags la mar phul bzhi dang /
T02TD2985E:53a-25: ba gcin phul bcu drug tu btsos la /
T02TD2985E:53a-26: khrus la sogs pa byas la snga ma dang 'dra bar bskus pa dang /
T02TD2985E:53a-28: ltor btang bas sha za'i gdon las nges par thar ro //
T02TD2985E:53a-29: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
